name: Movie Search App
goals: Get hands-on with MongoDB Atlas, and App Services
Better understand Atlas Search, and Vector Search

takeaways.title: Relevance-based Search vs Semantic Search
takeaways.description: Relevance-based search returns results explicitly containing search term, whereas semantic search will return data similar in meaning.

takeaways.title: NLP layer for 'free' in Vector Search
takeaways.description: We are retrieving embeddings but LLMs inherently have an NLP layer built-in for chatbot use cases (not just RAG). NLP layers are complex to build

takeaways.title: Serverless functions: Take the good with the bad
takeaways.description: Debugability is poor (debug locally as workaround) but an expected rigidity when dealing with serverless services. On par with lambda
